skill.name: flowio
skill.description: Parse FCS (Flow Cytometry Standard) files v2.0-3.1. Extract events as NumPy arrays, read metadata/channels, convert to CSV/DataFrame, for flow cytometry data preprocessing.
skill.summary: Parse FCS (Flow Cytometry Standard) files v2.0-3.1. Extract events as NumPy arrays, read metadata/ch...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill containing no executable code. It provides markdown guides for using the external FlowIO Python library. No file system access, network activity, or code execution occurs within the skill itself.

content.value_statement: You need a reliable way to read and create FCS files for flow cytometry data preprocessing. This skill provides clear documentation for parsing FCS files, extracting event data as NumPy arrays, and handling metadata for scientific workflows.
actual_capabilities: Parse FCS files for versions 2.0, 3.0, and 3.1
Extract event data as NumPy arrays with optional preprocessing
Read TEXT and ANALYSIS metadata and channel labels
Handle multi-dataset FCS files with dataset iteration
Create new FCS files from arrays and channel names
limitations: Does not perform advanced analysis like gating or compensation
Large files may require metadata-only reads for memory safety
Event data cannot be modified in place

use_cases.title: Quick file inspection
use_cases.description: Check event counts, channels, and acquisition metadata before analysis

use_cases.title: Batch summaries
use_cases.description: Generate per file summaries from a directory of FCS files

use_cases.title: Recreate FCS data
use_cases.description: Modify event arrays and export a new FCS file for downstream tools

prompt_templates.title: Read basic info
prompt_templates.prompt: Show how to read an FCS file and print version, event count, and channel labels.

prompt_templates.title: Metadata only
prompt_templates.prompt: Provide a snippet that reads only TEXT metadata and prints $DATE and $CYT.

prompt_templates.title: Multi dataset
prompt_templates.prompt: Demonstrate how to read all datasets from a multi dataset FCS file and list their event counts.

prompt_templates.title: Create new FCS
prompt_templates.prompt: Show how to create a new FCS file from a NumPy array with channel names and custom metadata.

output_examples.input: Summarize an FCS file and list fluorescence channels
output: FCS version 3.1 with 150,000 events and 10 channels

best_practices: Use only_text mode when you only need metadata
Preserve original TEXT metadata when re-exporting files
anti_patterns: Assuming every file has a single dataset
Forgetting to disable preprocessing when you need raw values
Overwriting files without validating channel counts

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill provides Python guidance that works across these platforms.

faq.question: What are the file size limits?
faq.answer: There is no fixed limit, but large files may need metadata-only reads.

faq.question: Can I integrate with pandas workflows?
faq.answer: Yes. The examples show converting event arrays to DataFrames.

faq.question: Does it access or transmit my data?
faq.answer: No. The skill content is documentation and does not run network calls.

faq.question: What if parsing fails with offset errors?
faq.answer: Use ignore_offset_discrepancy or ignore_offset_error options as shown.

faq.question: How does this compare to FlowKit?
faq.answer: FlowIO focuses on parsing and file creation, while FlowKit adds analysis like gating.
